content.rendered:
A couple is stranded at sea after a tropical storm washes away their villa. In the open sea, survival will be at stake, but they are forced to fight not only with harsh natural conditions, but also with predatory sharks.

Directed By Le-Van Kiet

Written By Le-Van Kiet

Stars: Alicia Silverstone. James Tupper. Deirdre O’Connell
